詃字的基本解释

詃
jiǎn
诱骗：“为大丈夫之法，何不自来取之，而以货詃引我边民。”

詃字的汉语字典释义

[①]［juǎn］
［《廣韻》姑泫切，上銑，見。］
诱骗。

詃字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　詃； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1153第08
【玉篇】古犬切【廣韻】姑泫切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】古泫切，?音畎。誘也，詐也。　又人名。希詃，見【宋史·宗室表】。

詃字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
詃字的起名意思

暂无。

詃
Basic explanation of words
詃
jiǎn
Lure: "For the law of a big man, why not take it by yourself and lure my border people with money."
詃
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［juǎn］
["Guangyun" Gu Xun cut, milled up, see you. ]
Deceive.
詃
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　詃; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: page 1153 08
[Jade articles] Ancient dog cut [Guangyun] Gu Xuan cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Gu Xuan cut,? Yin Dian. Lure also, fraud also.　Another name. Xipan, see [Song History·Clan List].
